name: DLH Holdings Corp.
description: DLH Holdings Corp. is a leading provider of healthcare and technology services to the federal government, specializing in support for public health, logistics, and information technology. Founded in 1969, DLH has a rich history of delivering solutions that enhance the effectiveness of government operations and improve the quality of life for citizens. The company offers a diverse portfolio of services, including health and wellness programs, clinical research, information technology, and operational support. DLH is committed to leveraging its expertise to meet the unique challenges of its federal clients, with a focus on delivering high-quality outcomes and efficient project management. The company is also dedicated to innovation and continuous improvement, investing in advanced technologies and methodologies to enhance service delivery. DLH's mission is to provide solutions that make a positive impact on the community while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and professionalism. As a trusted partner to various government agencies, DLH plays a vital role in supporting national health initiatives and improving healthcare access and delivery across the nation.

seo.meta_title: DLH Holdings Corp. | Healthcare and Technology Services
seo.meta_description: Explore DLH Holdings Corp., a leader in healthcare and technology services for the federal government. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to improving public health.

faq.question: What services does DLH Holdings provide?
faq.answer: DLH Holdings provides healthcare services, technology solutions, and operational support to the federal government.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of DLH Holdings?
faq.answer: Zachary Parker is the CEO of DLH Holdings Corp.

faq.question: Where is DLH Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: DLH Holdings is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
